Updates.Title: NEW FEATURES & BUG FIXES!
Updates.MainText:
This update contains a whole load of new stuff, including: 
 - Input lag clicks can now go up to 990. I don't know why either. 
- New option to add extra info to the heatmaps. Useful for tracking extra settings changes. 
- New option to display the date and time of the result, again good for distinguishing results 
- Save as PNG button is now working on the input lag mode.
